sentences.en: Confucius is not the advocator of the elaborate funeral.
sentences.cn: “孔子不是厚葬的倡导者”英语怎么写?

sentences.en: Dickson Furniture looks at itself as an advocator of quality life.
sentences.cn: 迪信家具,品质生活的倡导者!

sentences.en: Liszt is both the theme music creator, and its enthusiastic advocator.
sentences.cn: 李斯特是标题音乐的创始者, 也是热情的倡导者.

sentences.en: Oscer Wilde was the most active advocator and also the earnest practitioner of aestheticism.
sentences.cn: 奥斯卡?王尔德是唯美主义的最积极鼓吹者,也是唯美主义文学的身体力行者.
